          <title>
            <string language="en">Speed measurement using a trolley and light gates</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit Messen mit einer Laufkatze und 
Lichtgattern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure de vitesse à l'aide d'un chariot et des 
portes de lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medida da velocidade usando um trole e portas da 
luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Misura di velocità per mezzo di un carrello e 
dei cancelli della luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση ταχύτητας που χρησιμοποιεί ένα καροτσάκι και 
ελαφριές πύλες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Medida de la velocidad usando una carretilla y las
puertas de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows two laboratory set-ups for speed measurement using a trolley and light gates.</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre deux installations de

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra duas instalações do

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra due messe a punto del

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός εμφανίζει δύο εργαστηριακές
